page.title: 13SHOPS IN EAST LEAKE
page.content: As the village has grown,new premises for shops have been built.There are two supermarkets,one of which is very new.The people of the area are able to buy their foodstuffs locally as the village has a choice of general stores,butchers and greengrocers.There is also a bakers with its produce supplied from its main shop at Loughborough. The village has a large pet/gardening shop,a post office,three banks(one of which being a main branch and various building societies and estate agents. People have the opportunity of buying hot cooked food as there are two chipshops and a Chinese takeaway in the village. A lot of the shopping done by local people takes place in Loughborough and Nottingham where there are hyper markets and a full range of shops.
